name: Sea Monster Attacks Hunter
description:
A game about pirates killing sea monsters.

Follow the compass to seek out monsters and kill them. Who knows what kind of monstrosities could be lurking in the deeps.

Like a briny captain of the sea, it's a bit rough around the edges.

Controls:
World map - W to go and A/D to turn
Battle - A/D to move left and right
Mouse to aim
Space or left mouse button to shoot

Alternate:
Press Tab to use arrow key aiming - left/right to move aim

Programming/Art: Kyle Parsons
Music/Art: Joel Miller Tansley

Originally created for Ludum Dare 29.
